description:
Navy Captain Koby comes to the Island of Women to arrest Pirate Empress Hancock with the new Pacifistas. While the Navy and Kuja fighters clash, Blackbeard comes to raid, also targeting　Hancock.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chaos sur l`île des femmes. L`affaire du héros Kobby !
Nyougashima no Ran! Eiyuu Koby no Ikken
The War on the Island of Women! A Case Involving Koby the Hero
Tumult auf der Insel der Frauen! – Der Vorfall um den Helden Corby
الحرب على جزيرة النّساء! قضيّة تتعلّق بالبطل كوبي!
女ヶ島の乱! 英雄コビーの一件
